name: Verify DELETE /store/order/{orderId} handles invalid order IDs
description: Test verifies proper error handling when deleting orders with invalid IDs
descriptionHtml: Test verifies proper error handling when deleting orders with invalid IDs
statusMessage: Test case 'Maximum long value order ID' for DELETE: Status code should be 404, got 200 expected [404] but found [200]
